LEVEL 18:STAGE OF CAPTURING GALI!!!!!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Explorer Archive (Game Boy Color): Strategy: LEVEL 18:STAGE OF CAPTURING GALI!!!!!
By Y.K.TAN on Saturday, January 5, 2002 - 09:29 pm:

LEVEL 18

OK,THIS IS SERIOUS,GALI IS HERE,THE BIG BAD FOUR,LOL.

At the start of the stage,destroy the box on your left. Than walk 2 steps left,than create a box on your left,next to the wall,and destroy it,and you find a red feather thing,get it,and after the stage,you'll find gali,at the bonus stage. Go back to the starting point,create a box,and everything up to the metal ledge,than when the Dino is on the box,destroy it,and let the Dino fall to it's death. Create a box,and climb up the metal ledge.Than while the jell is away,destroy the box above you,than face left,when the jell is here,smack the box,and let it fall to it's death. Walk all the way to the left. Destroy the box on the left,drop down to where the Dino Is,than quickly jump of the platform,while the dino is on the box,destroy it,and it will again,kick the bucket,(starts to sing,may all enemy kick the bucket.lol). Jump down all the way,to the door,destroy the boxes on the right,quickly,destroy the boxes on the right,and get going,before the blue thingy floating come and kill you,climb up the right part of the map,and it will than one to reach you,but create a box,to fend it off,than after that,while blocking it,get down to the door,and win

BONUS STAGE:
HAVE AT LEAST A COMPLETE DISC STONE,AND CATCH GALI,GALI'S ATTACK IS TO STOP TIME,OR MAKE EVERYTHING STOP,DUN MOVE,ETC......
OK,than destroy boxes,at bonus stage,they are full of items,if you had had enough,than grab the key and win the stage.
